## Notes

-  eg  filter(n()>1, .by = grp)  should do same thing as add_count then filter n>1. 
-  example using n()>X in the filter, ie greater than X. then .by to group by topic. 
-  need to *use* this a lot more! 
 




## Example

```{r}
cheshire_petitions |> 
  filter(n()>25, .by=topic) |> 
  count(topic, sort = T) 

```
